alert.note: Alert for Boone; Dallas; Greene; Hamilton; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Greene, southeastern Webster, southwestern Hamilton, Boone and north central Dallas Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Ogden, or 8 miles north of Perry, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boone, Perry, Madrid, Ogden, Woodward, Boone Speedway, Grand Junction, Stratford, Rippey, Boxholm, Pilot Mound, Bouton, Luther, Fraser, Dana, Beaver, Berkley, Perry Municipal Airport, Boone Municipal Airport and Ledges State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
